name: UpdateRumApplication
description:
Update settings of a specific RUM application by ID.

Use this tool to modify the configuration or details of a RUM (Real User Monitoring) application within your organization by providing its ID.

parameters.name: rum_application_id
parameters.description: The ID of the RUM application to update.

parameters.name: rum_app_id
parameters.description: The unique ID of the RUM application to update.

parameters.name: rum_application_update_type
parameters.description: Specifies the RUM application update type. Allowed value is 'rum_application_update'.

parameters.name: rum_application_name
parameters.description: The name of the RUM application to be updated.

parameters.name: product_analytics_retention_state
parameters.description: Set the retention policy for Product Analytics data derived from RUM events. Accepted values: 'MAX', 'NONE'.

value_schema.description: Controls the retention policy for Product Analytics data derived from RUM events.

parameters.name: rum_event_processing_state
parameters.description: Configures which RUM events are processed and stored. Accepts 'ALL', 'ERROR_FOCUSED_MODE', or 'NONE'.

value_schema.description: Configures which RUM events are processed and stored for the application.

parameters.name: rum_application_type
parameters.description: Specify the type of RUM application. Valid options: `browser`, `ios`, `android`, `react-native`, `flutter`, `roku`, `electron`, `unity`, `kotlin-multiplatform`.

value_schema.description: Type of the RUM application. Supported values are `browser`, `ios`, `android`, `react-native`, `flutter`, `roku`, `electron`, `unity`, `kotlin-multiplatform`.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Datadog API.

parameters.name: data.attributes.product_analytics_retention_state
parameters.description: Controls the retention policy for Product Analytics data derived from RUM events.

value_schema.description: Controls the retention policy for Product Analytics data derived from RUM events.

parameters.name: data.attributes.rum_event_processing_state
parameters.description: Configures which RUM events are processed and stored for the application.

value_schema.description: Configures which RUM events are processed and stored for the application.

parameters.name: data.attributes.type
parameters.description: Type of the RUM application. Supported values are `browser`, `ios`, `android`, `react-native`, `flutter`, `roku`, `electron`, `unity`, `kotlin-multiplatform`.

value_schema.description: Type of the RUM application. Supported values are `browser`, `ios`, `android`, `react-native`, `flutter`, `roku`, `electron`, `unity`, `kotlin-multiplatform`.
